info.name: My CoRe Version
info.author: Frank Karlitschek, Bjoern Schiessle, Patrick Paysant
info.description: Fork of owncloud 7 app "Version" that allows maintaining older versions of files that are changed. This fork is absolutely not validated by original authors. Its answers to a specific need by CNRS. This app allows to restrain which users groups are allowed to use "versions" of their files.
